extendedInfo.description: Partake in this exhilarating runner game to feel the ultimate speed and challenge your agility! Try to avoid the barriers,go through the magic tunnel, jump over the space bridge... X runner is on the go!# Tilt phone to control# Tap on screen to jump# Collect invincible powerup to break any barrier# Collect invisible powerup to go through barriers# Magnet helps you absorb the coins on the way# Sprint makes you an invincible runner# More than 40 achievements to be unlockedDon't forget to invite your friends and share with them your high score and achievements!

reviews.title: Bunty
reviews.comment: It is awesome ........I enjoy the game.....I just love it....... It is my tp game ...it is good for people who have good graphic...................!
reviews.author: Sumit Das

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Not too bad a game quiet interesting nice to have character modify though but graphics are perfect
reviews.author: brerza parko

reviews.title: Great Runner
reviews.comment: As someone who played Temple Run a lot, I love this game. Very fast paced and great level design. No glitches to be found so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I really like this game, this game called cool and awsome. Please donwload and try it.
reviews.author: Doris Cera

reviews.title: The Best...
reviews.comment: ...Title I can find in this category. As fun as Temple Run is, this stands alone right beside it rather than in it\'s shadow. Smooth, colourful and intense. This would he my top pick.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Cool. More exciting than temple run. Can you add more characters but cool looking characters? Then I will give you 5 stars and I will check out more of your games or apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This game is even better than temple run! Never glitches on my tablet and missions are a challenge and not too easy. Only complaint is that there is only one charachter. It would be nice if we could buy others with the coins that we collect.
reviews.author: Vikki Collins

reviews.title: N.A.
reviews.comment: It\'s a gd game but it lags alot and often and needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This game has perfect graphics and the game is good. Just could there be more than one character to choose from.
reviews.author: adam holy

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great time buster. But only one life in game !!! Other than excellent. I am not giving full stars due to no more lifes in game. Hope it will resolve soon..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cozza\'s review
reviews.comment: My favourite running game ( I know its plain at the moment ) , the graphics are great , the only thing I ask is to slide under things and more powers , plus the price of powers lowered a little , plus a option to buy new characters with unique stats e.g speed , health/defence ( so u can run thru 1 or 2 blocks without dying ) ect. And a clothes/armour change for characters
reviews.author: Connor Moss

reviews.title: Perfect for everyone...
reviews.comment: This game is recommended not only by me but all the people in my contact. Everyone in my family has this game in their phones or tabs. Brilliant work guys..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The game is good...but
reviews.comment: Its not at all fair if you dont let us take coins even when we are on the same row of coins..unless we move exactly on coins...and yes tilt is a little buggy, but game is good...give us the option to choose the sensitivity, it will be good....but graphics are good...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Laggy a hell! Nexus S
reviews.comment: Reminds me of an old PC game I used to play called Betty Bad. Would give it a better score but it is laggy as hell on my Nexus S.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor game
reviews.comment: Poor. Bad game. I love temple run, but this is just unacceptable. It lags too much. I wish i could give it less than one star. I hate it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game is ok but the thing is that if u download this piece of shit then it wil blow ur notifctn with unwantd adds .. don\'t download i wil suggest . unstlng this crap ..

reviews.comment: I bought 30k gold, used it, the game crashed and didn\'t save the updates.

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I love the graphics but the game needs a redo powered were you start were you left off and more characters

reviews.title: One problem
reviews.comment: Why should i start from the beginning every timd i fail. I should have some check point that i should start from when i fail.

reviews.title: argh
reviews.comment: just one char, and that female.. we can\'t change it sex, running straight on, without any turn very boring i play it within 1 hour and bored
